arabic: أُولَٰئِكَ يُسَارِعُونَ فِي الْخَيْرَاتِ وَهُمْ لَهَا سَابِقُونَ
english: It is these who race for the good deeds, and they are foremost in them [e.g. offering the compulsory Salat (prayers) in their (early) stated, fixed times and so on].
bengali: তারাই কল্যাণ দ্রুত অর্জন করে এবং তারা তাতে অগ্রগামী।
